title: Winter salad of batavia with pomegranate
ingredients: ['1 batavia head, leaves washed and dried', '1 red pomegranate, quartered', '2 spring onions, trimmed', 'Leaves from 2 bushy sprigs of flat-leaved parsley', '3 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, chopped', 'Flaky sea salt and black pepper', '1Â½ teaspoons rice white wine vinegar']
